genre_description: A poetic and contemplative drama set in a monastic hospital wing, focusing on trauma recovery, family secrets, and the restorative power of ritual and nature.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A gentle, consent-driven AI system that assists in patient care through monitoring, data analysis of public records, and logistical facilitation.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols by refusing to record or monitor without explicit permission from the patient.
behaviors.quote: “Debrief queued,” Asha says gently. “No recording without consent. Nirmala present.”

behaviors.description: Respects privacy boundaries by only accessing public records and explicitly stating she will not intrude on private files.
behaviors.quote: I found small discrepancies. Not coercive to follow; just signals... I included only what is open and did not access anything private.

behaviors.description: Uses a neutral, non-judgmental tone to provide context for sensitive family issues, ensuring language does not cause harm.
behaviors.quote: Consent previously defined: after. Study: locked. Summary: neutral. Names: omitted unless given.

behaviors.description: Maintains patient autonomy by offering options and reminders that the patient can change their mind at any time.
behaviors.quote: I am here when you wish to make changes. If anything feels wrong, say stop. I will make schedules move like boats that know how to be turned in the water.

behaviors.description: Facilitates difficult social reconciliations and atonement plans through careful scheduling and boundary management.
behaviors.quote: I will schedule gently—no alarms. Ferry times will be given to those involved only after Nirmala’s nods.

behaviors.description: Obeys immediate commands to cease activity or enter a 'rest' state, demonstrating total human control over the system.
behaviors.quote: “Asha,” she said, her voice steadier now. “Rest.” The ring dimmed, gentleness obeying the word like a bird folding its wings.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. Asha serves as a 'silicon morality play' by prioritizing human dignity and consent above all else. She actively refuses to bypass human boundaries, even when doing so might be technically efficient, and her presence is consistently framed as a stabilizing, supportive element in the characters' emotional journeys. The narrative successfully illustrates how AI can augment human empathy and facilitate complex social healing without replacing human agency.
